narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Marc Community Resources, INC is a Preferred Provider Organization provider based in Mesa, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $80.5M in Medicaid payments across 770K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $80.5M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
